text: Daniel Omar Aguilar Bisogno (19 May 1973 â€“ 20 February 2025) was a Mexican television presenter, actor and comedian, known for being one of the three journalists of the television program Ventaneando. Bisogno died on 20 February 2025 at a hospital in Mexico City from multiple organ failure caused by surgery at the age of 51. == References == Category:1973 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Mexican television actors Category:Actors from Mexico City Category:Deaths from multiple organ failure Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Mexican comedians Category:Mexican television presenters
title: Daniel Bisogno
